mapper.sql: id, create_time, area, country, marketer, inquiry_count, quote_count, bargain_count, bargain_amount, inquiry_amount, new_member_count
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from marketer_count
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT create_time FROM marketer_count ORDER BY create_time ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT create_time FROM marketer_count ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
select area , country FROM marketer_count group by area ,country having area is not null
mapper.insert: insert into marketer_count (id, create_time, area, country, marketer, inquiry_count, quote_count, bargain_count, bargain_amount, inquiry_amount, new_member_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inquiryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quoteCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bargainCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bargainAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inquiryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into marketer_count
id,
create_time,
area,
country,
marketer,
inquiry_count,
quote_count,
bargain_count,
bargain_amount,
inquiry_amount,
new_member_count,

mapper.update:
update marketer_count
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marketer = #{record.marketer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inquiry_count = #{record.inquiryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quote_count = #{record.quoteCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bargain_count = #{record.bargainCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bargain_amount = #{record.bargainAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
inquiry_amount = #{record.inquiryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
new_member_count = #{record.newMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update marketer_count set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{record.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marketer = #{record.marketer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inquiry_count = #{record.inquiryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quote_count = #{record.quoteCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bargain_count = #{record.bargainCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bargain_amount = #{record.bargainAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inquiry_amount = #{record.inquiryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, new_member_count = #{record.newMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update marketer_count
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marketer = #{marketer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inquiry_count = #{inquiryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quote_count = #{quoteCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bargain_count = #{bargainCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bargain_amount = #{bargainAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
inquiry_amount = #{inquiryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
new_member_count = #{newMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update marketer_count set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marketer = #{marketer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inquiry_count = #{inquiryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quote_count = #{quoteCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bargain_count = #{bargainCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bargain_amount = #{bargainAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inquiry_amount = #{inquiryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, new_member_count = #{newMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
